## Checklist


### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have removed unnecessary console logs and debug code
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have checked for potential memory leaks

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on multiple devices/screen sizes
- [ ] I have tested in both light and dark mode
- [ ] I have tested accessibility features (VoiceOver, Dynamic Type)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments where necessary
- [ ] I have updated the README (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added inline documentation for public APIs

### Security & Privacy
- [ ] My changes don't introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have considered privacy implications
- [ ] I have updated privacy-related documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] Sensitive data is properly encrypted/protected

### UI/UX (if applicable)
- [ ] UI changes follow the app's design system
- [ ] UI is responsive and works on all supported devices
- [ ] Animations are smooth and performant
- [ ] Loading states are implemented
- [ ] Error states are handled gracefully
- [ ] Empty states are designed and implemented

### Accessibility (if applicable)
- [ ] VoiceOver labels are added and descriptive
- [ ] Touch targets meet minimum size requirements (44x44 points)
- [ ] Color contrast ratios are sufficient
- [ ] Dynamic Type is supported
- [ ] Interface works with accessibility features enabled
